verbs.description: [ARG1: Stormy Daniels] [V: is] [ARG2: full steam ahead] [ARGM-ADV: with plans to sue President Trump for defamation] , her lawyer said after a tense court hearing .
[ARG0: Stormy Daniels] is full steam ahead with plans to [V: sue] [ARG1: President Trump] [ARG2: for defamation] , her lawyer said after a tense court hearing .
